name: Dropper
description:
The enemies found you, so to escape from the futuristic military base without them capturing you, you are forced to dive down a vertical maintenance shaft. Obstacles fill your path as you fall. You can only hope there will be a safe landing.

Dropper, is a randomly generated, infinite game, where you must avoid obstacles as you fall down a maintenance shaft.

This game was made for a 48h game jam, so this is not final.
